item.title: About me
item.description: I develop Rest API for web applications and services in python. I set up infrastructure for web projects. I help businesses develop 💰 and users become happier 🎁. I managed the direction of FMCG. Organized the business processes of the enterprise, built a KPI system from scratch, carried out ISO 9001 certification and rebuilt the credit system. Since 2008 began to study complex financial instruments and trade on the NYSE, NASDAQ.
